title: Creditors Take Stake in Allianca and Light After Collateral Call
description: Creditors who financed troubled-asset investor Nelson Tanure moved to seize part of his stakes in Allianca Saude e Participacoes SA and Light SA after executing shares pledged as collateral in a transaction tied to his acquisition of Ligga Telecomunicacoes SA.
